title: Portland General Electric acquires $1.9B worth of utility operations and assets from PacifiCorp
description: Portland General Electric Company will acquire select Washington state operations from PacifiCorp for $1.9 billion, managing them through a new subsidiary.
content: Portland General Electric Company will acquire select Washington state operations from PacifiCorp for $1.9 billion, managing them through a new subsidiary.
